page.title: 05The Ellwood Ghost
page.content: IN THE LATE 1940s TWO MEN WERE WALKING DOWN TO THE ELLWOOD CROSS,THEY HAD JUST DROPPED TWO GIRLS OFF AT MILKWALL AND THEY WERE ABOUT TO GO HOME. IT WAS A VERY DARK NIGHT AND THEY WERE JUST ABOUT TO REACH ELLWOOD CROSS WHEN A SHAPE OF A FIGURE FLOATED ACROSS THE ROAD,THEN THE FIGURE FLEW DOWN TO LONELY FARM,THEY STARTEDTO RUN DOWN TO MARSH LANE AND DIDN'T STOP RUNNING. PHONIX PIT THERE USED TO BE A PIT CALLED "PHONIX PIT" IN FETTER HILL,THEY FOUND A MAN HANGING IN THE PIT AND THE STORY GOES IF YOU TAKE DOG THERE THE DOG WILL GO UP AROUND THE HILL AND THE MASTER ON UP THE ROAD. FESTIVALS EVERY YEAR AT SLING THEY HAVE A ROASTING THE PIG,ABOUT 150 PEOPLE GO THERE ALL THE MONEY GOES TO CHARITY.
